  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_298</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Historia de las matemáticas</string>
            <string language="en">A history of Mathematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Geschichte von Mathematik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une histoire des mathématiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um history da matemática</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una storia di matematica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ιστορία των μαθηματικών</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla algunas páginas de la Historia de la matemática griega. Se utilizan las simulaciones para ilustrar algunos de los problemas geométricos clásicos estudiados en la antigua Grecia.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which looks at some of the pages in the history of Greek mathematics. Simulations are used to illustrate some classic geometrical problems that where studied in Ancient Greece.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">razón áurea</string>
            <string language="en">golden ratio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Pitágoras</string>
            <string language="en">Pythagoras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Grecia</string>
            <string language="en">Greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">historia</string>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welches einige der 
Seiten in der Geschichte der griechischen Mathematik betrachtet. 
Simulationen werden verwendet, um einige klassische geometrische
Probleme zu veranschaulichen, die, wo studiert in altem Griechenland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement ce qui regarde certaines des
pages dans l'histoire des mathématiques grecques. Des 
simulations sont employées pour illustrer quelques problèmes 
géométriques classiques qui là où étudié en Grèce antique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando qual olha algumas das páginas 
no history da matemática grega. As simulações são usadas 
ilustrar alguns problemas geométricos clássicos que onde estudado em
Greece antigo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quale guarda alcune delle 
pagine nella storia della matematica greca. Le simulazioni sono 
usate per illustrare alcuni problemi geometrici classici che dove 
studiato in Grecia antica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που εξετάζει μερικές από τις 
σελίδες στην ιστορία των ελληνικών μαθηματικών. Οι 
προσομοιώσεις χρησιμοποιούνται για να επεξηγήσουν μερικά κλασικά 
γεωμετρικά προβλήματα ότι όπου μελετάται στην αρχαία Ελλάδα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">goldenes Verhältnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pythagoras</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
